tag_list: no-problem-ceo-and-founder, local-search-monetization-engine, online-directory, yellow-pages, pay-per-call, pay-per-action
overview:
Daniel Shaked is CEO and founder of NO PROBLEM, the “local search monetization engine”, a full end-to-end pay-per-call platform for online directory publishers including Yellow Pages groups worldwide.

Daniel founded NO PROBLEM in 2006 with the vision of creating a global company providing a best-in-class web-traffic monetization software platform for directory publishers looking to evolve to pay-per-action.

Under his leadership, the NO PROBLEM ISRAEL online directory has grown from beta-site to a successful 100% pay-per-call local publisher utilizing NO PROBLEM’s unique technology platform, featuring multiple callback functionality and real-time bid adjustment.

Prior to founding NO PROBLEM, Daniel served as VP Operations at SmarTeam LTd, acquired by Dassault Systems (DASTY, NASDAQ).

Daniel holds a bachelor degree in Mechanical Engineering, as well as an MBA.
